website_summaries.verdict: Best for multitasking or resource intensive software, this model will give any compatible computer a major memory upgrade.
pros: Designed to survive a hot PC
cons: This pretty model is a rather pricy memory upgrade

customer_reviews.title: holy these are bright and awesome
customer_reviews.text: If you want to light up your case, get these sticks! These also have a soft rainbow pulsing effect so it’s not just a static light. I will post a video at some point. I mean you put these in and you really don’t need any other lighting in your rig. It will glow. I am using these in my Asus Maximus Hero XI (wifi) and mention this because there is another review here saying that these sticks can’t be used in that board. 8/26/19 update: ordered 2 more sticks and added a few more pics of 4 lighting up the case.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Cannot use 2 sticks on ASUS MAXIMAS HERO XI
customer_reviews.text: I can use one but not two. Two gives a cc error and will not post. 1 stick boots up 70% of the time. I have tried 6 sticks of this RAM on 2 different mother boards. To no avail. Both manufacturers were quick to get me to replace the items. I also spent. MANY HOUR with many tech supports. They talked me into trying one more board but Amazon wants to investigate this next return before the refund me to get another....
customer_reviews.author: Edge1973

customer_reviews.title: Simply the Best
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for great RAM with the added benefit of RGB lighting, look no further. This RAM from Corsair is vastly superior in both. It not only performs excellent, but the variation in colors looks fantastic! Very easy to install, and the black looks great when the RGB lighting is flashy its colors. Yes, it is more expensive than other ram, but you are paying for quality - and the quality of Corsair in general gives me extra security in buying their products! 10/10 highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Stable and...pretty.
customer_reviews.text: Worked flawlessly out of the box. Set the XMP 2.0 profile with just a click in BIOS and it was set up and done. Colors are beautiful albeit a bit of the pastel variety, shade wise. As far as value for money is concerned I felt that it and pretty much all RAM for PC's as of the date of purchase are still over priced. Excellent product overall, just took a star off for the cost of this set of RAM sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Viau

customer_reviews.title: Misread the description - changing my review to positive (2100 speed in desc)
customer_reviews.text: I misread the speed - the memory total functions as it should - buying 2 more chips - read in the description - it's 2100 speed max.
customer_reviews.author: S King

customer_reviews.title: Corsair is my go to RAM
customer_reviews.text: I have built several desktop computers at home, and I always use Corsair RAM. It is very dependable and should I need to contact customer service, they are great! This RAM has amazing lighting effects that put on a vivid color light show through my glass window case. The lighting is a really cool addition to an amazing RAM package that fits my needs. I always recommend contacting Corsair to identify your specific RAM version best suited to your motherboard and CPU.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: So Good I Got Another 2 Sticks
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 32gb 3200 Kit. They work awesome and the RGB's are very bright. These worked so good for me that I bought another set. My gaming rig now runs 64gb of Ram. IMPORTANT: YOU MUST GO INTO THE BIOS AND SET THE SPEED TO 3200. THEY DO NOT COME STOCK SPEED THAT IS ADVERTISED. I say that to avoid any confusion. At first I thought I bought the wrong ones but nothing a bios setup couldn't fix. I love these and highly recommend this memory to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob L.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, runs terribly.
customer_reviews.text: The 3200mhz kit doesnt run at all. Used a MSI z170a sli pro plus. I7 6700k overclocked to 4.6 ghz. I pumped the IO and SA voltages up to 1.25, and the DRAM voltage up to 1.47 volts which is near the upper bounds of the safe limits. Despite that, the ram never ran at the rated 3200mhz speed and timing. In fact, it didnt even post at 3000mhz. The max that I was able to run this kit at was 2.8mhz. Unacceptable. Poor performing.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great power
customer_reviews.text: Great value, great power, good for games, easy to install, honestly might be overkill but who cares? My only disappointment - and the reason I took off a whole star - is that the software support is disappointing and it doesn't play well with third party RGB apps. All my other RGB accessories - fans on the motherboard, lights on the GPU, etc - have no problem, but these two don't seem to want to cooperate half the time, ruining the aesthetic.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome RAM
customer_reviews.text: first of all it works perfectly in the Asus Maximus XII Hero (WiFi). I am overclocking this ram big time along with my unlocked Intel I9 CPU. I have inserted 4 modules. I use Icue software to control the lighting. These modules are bright and I mean bright... You will need to download Corairs Icue control center to work these. Since I have both the corsair Gaming Keyboard and Mouse, i control all of them through the software.. Ram is excellent
customer_reviews.author: RPR dude

customer_reviews.title: Killer Performance and Style
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that I would not be able to disable the RGB and not be able to choose just a solid color, if I could I would've got the non RGB but they were sold out. I'm a grown man I don't need my case looking like the inside of a rave but however thru the iCue software I was able to just get a solid blue but with a twist, a raindrop like animation so thats cool as the rest of my setup is a solid static blue. Performance is what you'd expect, solid.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Phisher

customer_reviews.title: RGB RAM Nobody Needs it But its Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Never did I think I would want light up RAM sticks, but here we are. I purchased these ram sticks because they were some of the fastest sticks that were verified to work on my motherboard. The fact that they could light up were not originally a selling point for me. After installing them I gotta say they look great and run fast. Mine were samsung b-die for anyone who cares about that. I am having trouble getting them to run at the full 3200 speed, but its more likely an issue with my motherboard than the sticks. I'll have to run more tests to know for sure, but at 2133 speed everything is running fine.
customer_reviews.author: WooStuff

customer_reviews.title: Works great, and was 37% off.
customer_reviews.text: $184 for 32GB DDR4 Corsair 3200 MHz ram that also has RGB color, and the best any ram has that I’ve seen. Can’t beat that. The ram works great. I had a little trouble at first, no matter what DRAM Frequency I chose the computer wouldn’t boot. I needed to update my bios so that mystic light and iCue would work anyway, so I updated. I got my i7 6700k running at 4.6 ghz and the DRAM running at 3200 MHz easily after that.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Runs on my motherboard and quite the light show
customer_reviews.text: Compatible with ROG Strix X570-E at full 3200 speed Manual overclocking is achieved through the Ai Tweaker menu of the Strix X570-E Gaming’s Advanced mode GUI. Choosing D.O.C.P as the overclocking mode allows the board to select memory frequency and timings based on the module’s XMP programming prior to manual tuning.
customer_reviews.author: jamdo63

customer_reviews.title: Corsair RAM hardware is good, but Corsair software is unreliable
customer_reviews.text: The Corsair RAM works for practical functions, but its RGB LED could run into conflicts with the motherboard's RGB LED control, and this conflict could turn off the RAMs' LED. My motherboard is MSI X570 Gaming Plus, and it uses MSI Dragon Center's Mystic Light software to control the entire PC's LEDs. Mystic Light could have unreliable control or conflicts with Corsair RAMs' LED and/or Corsair iCUE (software to control Corsair products' LED). Corsair iCUE could also conflict with Nvidia GPU's software called GeForce Experience. The Internet message boards have plenty of stories about the unreliability of MSI software and Corsair software.
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Yu

customer_reviews.title: Works with Ryzen 7 2700x / x370
customer_reviews.text: I installed this memory into my PC that has a MSI X370 Gaming Pro Carbon motherboard and it booted using DDR4-2133 speed (Default). Then I entered the BIOS/UEFI setup and enabled the XMP #2 profile for DDR4-3200 and CL16 and rebooted the PC. The PC booted into windows without any issues and I verified the memory clock speed and latency using CPUz. * For the RGB control you need to download the "iCUE" software from the Corsiar website.
customer_reviews.author: Stepside

customer_reviews.title: Corsair Vengeance RGB PRO 32GB (2x16GB) DDR4 3200 RAM
customer_reviews.text: Install: easy, with all pc components there is always concern for handling as to not break the connections performance: cpu is still new so I haven't really put it through its paces, but its lightning quick on everything so far I am using the machine for a number of things including an engineering workstation, video editing and gaming
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Plug and play, easy RGB setting.
customer_reviews.text: Got it on sale. Worked right out the box, no messing with bios to get the speed right with AMD CPU and Asus MB. Machine is blazing fast now. I didn't realize that I had a bottleneck until I saw the performance difference. Also, I like the RGB software, and being able to decide what color is cold and what is hot. I didn't think I'd like the light, but having light as a temperature indicator is nice. Would be nice if it could be a color for usage, I don't think that option was available.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Ragan

customer_reviews.title: LEDs always on
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find a way to turn the LEDs off when the computer was sleeping. The LED animations are pretty smooth and nice looking. One of my sticks ended up being defective so I returned them. I got some HyperX RGB ones that don't have any problem turning off when the computer is asleep.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!  But beware the physical size if you don't have much space!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Looks amazing in my case! Performance is fantastic. Just be careful if you are replacing existing RAM. Mine almost didn't fit - oh so close to having the radiator in the way. I actually had to remove the radiator to get these into the slots.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle C Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Good Memory
customer_reviews.text: Great for installing only 2 memory cards for 32 GB. Final install of processor cooler would have prevented me from installing two more memory cards since it is almost touching the memory card in the second slot and is blocking the first memory slot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 of these DDR4 worked but 4 didn't
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 slots and had initially purchased one kit(2 DDR4 modules) which worked flawlessly. When I decided to add another kit, the computer refused to boot. I swapped the modules around but no difference. The 2 I have installed work great! (32GB RAM)
customer_reviews.author: Gary T

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and easy to set up and change colors!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ram I mostly upgraded from 42gbs of ram to this corsair ram 64gbs of ram (two boxes) because I wanted to RGB out my PC! I think it looks incredible and I love it! Also, I stream here on Amazon 5 days a week around 7:00pm(PDT) if you have any questions about this ram or would like any PC building advice come join my streams! You can find my previous Amazon streams on my Amazon Profile
customer_reviews.author: Atara

customer_reviews.title: Doubled my RAM, mesmerizing ROYGBIV design!  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This pair brought my machine up to 64GB of memory. Sweet! It installed easily and we were up and running in minutes. The ROYGBIV is actually nicer and shows more light action than my other 32GB sticks. I wish both sets were this prettier one, but oh well. This set is SO nice to look at, it's mesmerizing. I don't know all the tech details but this was a perfect purchase - and attractive too, in my clear sided white case!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany CherryBlossom

customer_reviews.title: Excess for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Literally bought this for excess amount of memory. My system idles at four GB. I would have been fine with 16GB but I figured a couple extra dollars wouldn't hurt. Speed is fine. My mobo doesn't allow the oc, but thats no issue for me. Ill be able to use this on a future system anyway. I mainly use my pc for gaming, productivity, and circuit design/simulation. Trust me when I say this is beyond enough RAM for my usage. If you need RAM for gaming alone you can save money by getting less memory.
customer_reviews.author: LMaster

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: So yeah, MOST of us are buying these because we're obsessed with RGB. I have to say, these modules don't disappoint. I prefer them greatly to the Trident RGB sticks, and would recommend them to anyone who has bought in even just a little to the Corsair ecosystem.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor H.

customer_reviews.title: Brightest RGB RAM with Asus Aura Sync compatibility
customer_reviews.text: If you plan to use Asus Aura Sync with this ram you need to install additional software. Go to Corsair's website and go to the downloads section. Search for iCue and Asus Aura Sync plugin then install them in that order. Once installed update the ram in iCue and enable full control option in the Ram's specific settings. Now the ram will be compatible with Asus Aura Sync. Your welcome!
customer_reviews.author: retroexchange

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and flashy
customer_reviews.text: Corsair has never let me down with quality. If you need some ram for your PC and like having some flashy lights these are perfect. Performance wise, they have done amazing. My computer runs faster and opens programs quickly now compared to before. I had 16 gigs installed and I bought two more 16 gigs. So now running at around 48 gigs with these installed it's buttery smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: DOES NOT WORK WITH RYZEN X470 CHIPSET!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work with Ryzen, or at least not with ROG Strix x470 pro gaming + Ryzen 2700x. Check out G Skill for compatible 32gb 3200hz DDR4 RAM (got mine to overclock to 3600 no prob).
customer_reviews.author: Dane I.

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming! Honest review
customer_reviews.text: Wowwwwwww! LED 10/10 Speed 10/10 Design looks better in person then in picture to! Didn’t have any trouble running at 3200 speed No failure in the ram. Only thing I ran into was my motherboard want me to put it in the second slot 1b 2b instead of 1a 2a. But I would 10/10 buy again especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: Kouki Chrisp

customer_reviews.title: Decent ram looks good in my build.
customer_reviews.text: Running on my b450-f strix without any problems. Great looking ram, and speedy. I'm not over clocking the ram. Mobo recognized it at 3200mhz without having to set it manually which was nice. Was running T-Force 16gig set before and had to manually set it to the right frequency. Anyways worth the money if you get it on sale.
customer_reviews.author: C. Crouch

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and fast
customer_reviews.text: These replaced my extremely abused 16gb dominator 2400mhz sticks. They are absolutely gorgeous and fast. For a heavy streamer/content creator I really needed to finally upgrade from 16gb and let me tell you. It’s so nice not having 95% of your ram occupied. 32gb should be the new standard. They do get a little bit toasty though. Highest temp I’ve seen them at is 48°C.
customer_reviews.author: DjZGFX

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic ddr4 10/10
customer_reviews.text: Running 64gigs at 3200 no problem on x570 with a 3700x, gorgeous lighting, memory itself is high quality. Noticing some reviews coming from people with low quality old systems. Make sure your motherboard supports ddr4 and you're not slapping it in a toaster. There's a compatibility list (for all ram) check it before you buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Losangelesi

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2x16, but i received 2x8
customer_reviews.text: the memories are very good, but they don't pay attention to the shipments. not RGB, not 32GB, my worst experience on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but I'm not a gamer
customer_reviews.text: I had a conflict with mixing memory on my custom computer, so I replaced them all with these and have had no problems since. And the programmable multi-color light show is really cool through a glass case!!! Matches my keyboard and mouse, so adjusting all through the installed "dashboard" makes it really easy to tweak and update.
customer_reviews.author: Frangela-2

customer_reviews.title: performing
customer_reviews.text: love it, I put another 32gb to be 64GB anything can be done, Do your imagination the way you want it. Ryzen 3950x Corsair H115i XFX RX580 xxx Edition (2) Power: Corsair RM850x full module MB: Asus Rog X570 Crosshair VIII Hero OPS: window 10 Pro HD:intel 660 M.2 1TB
customer_reviews.author: S. Silver

customer_reviews.title: work flawlessly with ryzen 9 3600x
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a good 32 Gb memory and didn't want to break the bank for my new Ryzen 9 3900X. I decided to gamble and bought this memory. Both modules works about of the box in my Gygabyte X570 arus Ultra.
customer_reviews.author: crossbone2007

customer_reviews.title: work great, make sure you enable xmp profile in your system bios
customer_reviews.text: I love the rgb lights on these and they look great. Make sure you enable XMP profile in your system bios to get full benefits of ram speed. After installing in msi 470 motherboard it booted up to these setting in bios the first time. I have no complaints and i am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M

customer_reviews.title: What are you waiting for? Absolute must buy.
customer_reviews.text: RGB is bright and fantastic. Easy to install and the bios recognized it at the proper speed without having to change a single setting (Gigabyte Aorus Z270 K7 gaming). Upgraded from a 16GB 3000mhz kit and I didn't think the change would be that noticeable but my Overall FPS across all the titles I play increased significantly. Once again another solid kit from Corsair. I've been buying their products, especially ram, since 2005 and they have never ever let me down. And for the price? If you are on the fence, just pull the trigger it's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: David Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ram, only complaint is that the ram lights will randomly have their led profiles disabled or reset causing me to have to redo it in corsairs icue program. Apparently a known issue with their software currently. If they could get icue to download firmware and handle profiles correctly for all their peripherals then we’d have a flawless product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Storm Cleary

customer_reviews.title: Samsung B-Die
customer_reviews.text: Purchased CMW32GX4M2C3200C16 and according to Thaiphoon Burner: Module Manufacturer: Corsair Module Part Number: CMW32GX4M2C3200C16 Module Series: Vengeance RGB PRO DRAM Manufacturer: Samsung DRAM Components: K4A8G085WB-BCPB DRAM Die Revision / Process Node: B / 20 nm
customer_reviews.author: Chester C.

customer_reviews.title: Still have this in my build and love it
customer_reviews.text: These sticks are great for gaming and other stuff probably. I don't have an issue with gaming with these in my build, really fast clock speeds and lots memory available for more than gaming if you want it. The only thing that prevents the 5 star review is the height of the RAM sticks, it was competing with my CPU cooler fan and my AIO when I switched to it. Make sure you have enough clearance for coolers with these, as they're "high profile"!
customer_reviews.author: NaCobi C Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Durable, fast, and most importantly, it's a sight to behold
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best looking RAM stick I've ever seen, but also really fast. The only downsidenis the price.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: lighting pattern is inverted
customer_reviews.text: i bought two of these, i like the coloring and performance, however i tried with iCue software to make the lighting direction the same but didn't work, the flow always to the opposite direction, for example when you select sequential lighting effect, one of them will go down and the other one will go up.
customer_reviews.author: Hosam

customer_reviews.title: Wow. These are seriously bright.
customer_reviews.text: Love this ram. I bought two, and luckily they happened to be two sets produced in series. Super fast and seriously bright. Obviously not the best value, you pay for RGB, but I do like this set. Feels like the price.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great ram
customer_reviews.text: I got these on a great deal last December so the $ was right at the time otherwise it’s kind of expensive ram. Easy to address the RGB and just go into bios to clock up to 3200 and your set, very easy!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Fandrich

customer_reviews.title: it works well
customer_reviews.text: it looks cool and works very well. i may actually upgrade my other 2 ram sticks to this one. i like how you can customize the color because i got the green mantis pc and all the lights are green so i made the ram sticks green and set it to breath. but they do tons of other colors like rainbow and stuff.
customer_reviews.author: michael hughes

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Building a desktop gaming rig with my son and he wanted RGB effects inside the case. These do the trick. Good, fast, and their solid and weighty. They are compatible with the light managing software he uses. Pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Works with a Gigabyte Gaming 7 Z170X Mobo
customer_reviews.text: This RAM is compatible with my older Gigabyte Gaming 7 motherboard. This info isn't listed ANYWHERE so thought I would do a public service announcement.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: works as expected, i did have to clock the ram to fit the speed its labeled as as mb or windows 10 throttles down to 2600mhz or something. no other issues and that is a 10 second fix, googleable with video step by step to help those less computer savy are available
customer_reviews.author: shankstab

customer_reviews.title: good ram for a good price
customer_reviews.text: nice ram for a good price, my only gripe is that the retail sticker faces the opposite direction from my lpx ram,so i was a little confused when installing it. Everything works fine now and I wasn't even sure if it would work with my lpx ram.
customer_reviews.author: supadupakoopa

customer_reviews.title: they sent me the wrong ram
customer_reviews.text: This ram is listed as 3200mhz ram but if you open your task manager you can clearly see that it is in fact 2133mhz which is worth significantly less than the 3200mhz modules. DO NOT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Quality product with kool blinky lights! Me like
customer_reviews.text: Decided to jump on the RGB train. But when in Rome do as the Roman's? Yeah looks nice but I know in a few years this whole RGB trend will look as ridiculous as butterfly collars and bell bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Illusive0ne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use XMP. Super fast!
customer_reviews.text: Even though I’ll mostly be using this machine for gaming, I went for 32GB to future proof my system and to have plenty of room for software development work. Easily OC’d to 3200MHz by clicking one button in my UEFI... XMP. Motherboard is a MSI Z390-A Pro. This ram works flawlessly in it. RGB is dope!
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Solid memory
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Good high speed memory for gaming. The lights looks great in my glass sided case .
customer_reviews.author: StellRJ

customer_reviews.title: Plug and play, no mess
customer_reviews.text: Bought a iBuypower PC with 16 GB from costco, upgraded with these 32 GB sticks. Very easy to install. Worked without any mess. RGB lights look very good. My Son's feedback is, Fortnite games works awesome. Zero pings and 165 FPS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mesmerizing and powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not overly educated on in-depth PC parts but I can say this, it does what it was supposed to do! I can multitask like crazy with these babies! Mesmerizing and a definite cop from me!
customer_reviews.author: J Luna

customer_reviews.title: One 16 gb not useable
customer_reviews.text: Okay I love that they light up, but anything that lights up I love... They clicked in a little poorly and arrived with the package dented, so one 16 is not useable.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina V.

customer_reviews.title: I am a happy camper!
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered quickly, looks great and works perfectly! Took a little bit of tweaking to get my motherboard to recognize the actual speed but otherwise was a breeze to install!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Marino

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: RAM is RAM not much to say about them. The build quality looks top knotch and they worked right out of the box and work as expected. I bought the 16GBx2 kit to replace an old 8GBx4 kit from corsair that failed after 3 years. I will update if anything happens.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price and very bright leds
customer_reviews.text: This ram has really bright led bars on them, so if you are into that then you'll enjoy these. The ram part of it is also great and does the job i need it to.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Work as advertised. I installed them on a msi z270 pc mate motherboard and because i got the 3200hz version I am running OC genie to take full advantage of them. The RGB works wondefully with iCUE!
customer_reviews.author: DY

customer_reviews.title: Not samsung B-die but who cares... 3200mhz running fast just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: So this is not a samsung B-die RAM, but I was able to run at the advertised speed after enabling XMP profile in the BIOS. On the first try. No issues, no hiccups. The RGB component also looks a lot better than I thought it would. Excellent RAM.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Easy to install. Syncs with other Corsair RGB products easily with icue. My only con is when system goes to sleep the ram will still display the same lighting pattern. So I just have to make sure I turn off all lighting effects before pc goes to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: Work great out of the box
customer_reviews.text: These ram sticks took minutes to install, and lit up immediately when the PC was powered, in a rainbow pattern. I use iCUE to change the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with My Purchase and I CUE is easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Customizing the lighting is very easy. It seems I might need to address a cooling issue, but that is probably not related to this product. I am loving the performance I am getting now. Thumbs way up. Not perfect but pretty close.
customer_reviews.author: Technology Authority

customer_reviews.title: Great RAM overall
customer_reviews.text: Great ram, have had no issues with XMP profile as I have with other brands. 3200MHz fits my needs perfectly. Nothing to add and no complaints. Works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Good choice with a sale
customer_reviews.text: Decent value though I've had some BSOD instances. I ran different memory tests and it doesn't seem to be the memory cards but who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Marls

customer_reviews.title: Need a quarterback?
customer_reviews.text: Besides the fact the front i opened, before I had opened it, looked like it caved in somehow and that picture was just after opening it... no packing, of any kind. Luckily it looks like its in one piece so we'll see. Thats on Amazon, ram sticks always a top choice
customer_reviews.author: Danny Rand

customer_reviews.title: Not actually 3200mhz, just 2133mhz. Cannot be overclocked to 3200mhz.
customer_reviews.text: Imagine my surprise when I found out that this memory isn't actually what it says on the tin. Also should be noted that this isn't compatible at all with the Crosshair VIII Hero, despite several indications that it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Wright

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. RGB and fast performance
customer_reviews.text: Got these to upgrade my nephews memory on his gaming pc. Installation was so easy. No issues upon reboot. If your into all the RGB stuff you need these.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Luck 29

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: It's ram. Not much to say about it as long as it doesn't fail. This is high quality. Just splurge and get the 32GB. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: SW Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great value when you catch it on a sale, I was looking to go full RGB so this was a no brainer. Great amount of RAM, RGB lighting, and easy to install all with a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W.

customer_reviews.title: Not stable at 3200mhz
customer_reviews.text: Ram is unable to oc to 3200mhz, tested in 2 pcs, causes near instant crashes in both. stable at 3000 but that's not what I paid for. Pretty colors work but I didn't pay all this money for just the pretty colors.
customer_reviews.author: nhra girl

customer_reviews.title: YES!
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love a ton of RAM?!?! This is so much more than I could ever need and I love it! I don't even know what to do with all this RAM! Also RGB so fluid, such beautiful look!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Brasile

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great price and I love the led light . Only problem is the led light not going off when I set my computer to sleep mode.
customer_reviews.author: Albert.G

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, works good, nobrainer . Stop shopping around!!! I spend like 5 hrs and ended up getting this.
customer_reviews.author: Nohbody

customer_reviews.title: Cool lights!
customer_reviews.text: Just built my new PC and these made a great addition to my set up. The lighting effects are great!
customer_reviews.author: Tim B.

customer_reviews.title: RBG means its twice as fast
customer_reviews.text: This RAM looks awesome and its Corsair Vengeance, what else is there to say? It's great RAM. Is there better value RAM our there? Yeah, you could get 3600 mhz without RGB by a different brand but then it doesnt have RGB and therefor functions slower.
customer_reviews.author: Cade

customer_reviews.title: Wow these are fast
customer_reviews.text: Coming from 1600 to these there's no comparison. I have them on a b450 ASRock board and got them up to 3700
customer_reviews.author: Iman Kassim

customer_reviews.title: The RAM works great but don't count on icue - corsair RGB application
customer_reviews.text: RAM works as expected and is successfully identified by the Ryzen. However, Corsair application that controls the RGB causes my PC to get black screens. After removing it everything works as usual.
customer_reviews.author: ddleon

customer_reviews.title: Exelent product.
customer_reviews.text: Exelent product looks great and works good but the speed of 3200mhz is misleading they are only 3000mhz still a good deal but still disappointed that they are not what they advertise to be ***** Update **** Im very new to the modding comunity ,a few tweak and they are at full speed even a bit more , but perfectly capable of reaching 3200mhz very happy with my purchase .
customer_reviews.author: Jander

customer_reviews.title: Fast RAM, pretty colors
customer_reviews.text: I bought them on sale at a good price for a new build. They perform well. The LED light show is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: DougMac

customer_reviews.title: Stay out of my room, mom
customer_reviews.text: It's RAM and it works as such. The LEDs let your mom know your a serious gamer. But stay out of my room mom!
customer_reviews.author: Alex L.

customer_reviews.title: good for ryzen
customer_reviews.text: for my ryzen 3600x and my asus x570 tuf gaming plus wifi i set the docp aka xmp profile and DONE already at
customer_reviews.author: William Shuemake

customer_reviews.title: Great price/performance/capacity for itx
customer_reviews.text: Attractive ram. Ryzen users will likely have to spend quite a while with trial and error getting advertised speeds. If your building in a sff case these are far from being low profile, they’re about 3/4” taller than my viper 4s
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended this price point, just wish I had space to add for
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wells

customer_reviews.title: Good value nice vibrant leds
customer_reviews.text: These memory modules have performed to my expectations. The OC speed was easy to set via my MB and has made a difference on my system.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful RGB
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Ram! The RGB is stunning! My only gripe is that the dimm are a little too tall. Could have done more research I suppose but I couldn’t fit my radiator at the top of my case. It was hitting the dimm. Overall they are beautiful and look amazing!
customer_reviews.author: S. Balli

customer_reviews.title: Oooo! Pretty Colors!
customer_reviews.text: Very fast memory! RGB is brilliant and easily programmed. Good ventilation is a must as this stuff heats up. Do you need 3200MHz? Can your processor drive it? Questions to consider.
customer_reviews.author: James F Allen

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Ryzen
customer_reviews.text: Great ram, no problems in a ryzen 5 3600x w/ x570 chipset rig
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey

customer_reviews.title: Really added speed
customer_reviews.text: My son was floundering in his gaming with the mere 16 GB that we used to build his system. Now that thing flies.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Land

customer_reviews.title: All about the RGB
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t the fastest memory kit that can be purchased for the price, but the rgb looks nice and links up well in builds with other Corsair products. I installed these sticks into an AsRock x570 Steel Legend mobo and the XMP profile worked fine out of the box. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LIF3SaBEACH

customer_reviews.title: best so far
customer_reviews.text: install was easy boosted pc performance and lokms great can change pattern and colors
customer_reviews.author: J. Rouach

customer_reviews.title: Looks absolutely gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: This rgb ram is awesome and looks amazing. No problems on the Asus prime z390-p motherboard
customer_reviews.author: Michael Clark

customer_reviews.title: Love these and the RGB lights
customer_reviews.text: RGB lights are very smooth and RAM is working great
customer_reviews.author: Lucille

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Got this at a good price. I mean it’s a Vengence RGB Pro. Does anything else really need to be said?
customer_reviews.author: Frank Wong

customer_reviews.title: Visually hypnotic, great performance
customer_reviews.text: I've never been a fan of the RGB craze, but the price-to-performance of this kit made the purchase irresistible. A nice boost to performance in games. The lighting options with the iCue software is extremely flexible and impressive to watch.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan F.

customer_reviews.title: Looks are runs amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some bling in my new build so I got these nice RGB memory sticks - Vengeance RGB PRO 32GB (2x16GB) DDR4 3200. No issues at all. Works great and looks great! Downloaded Corsair iCUE and ran custom lighting tool. I love it, but my wife hates the blinking lights...lol
customer_reviews.author: lewtman11

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, works great. Upgraded from 16gb ddr4 to 32gb ddr4 and this ram is excellent. The rgb is just an extra feature to mess with. I wish there was a way to sync with other rgb but they are a different brand so thats a no go. But other than that I am really enjoying the product.
customer_reviews.author: james jones

product_meta.title: Corsair Vengeance RGB Pro 32GB (2x16GB) DDR4 3200 (PC4-25600) C16 Desktop Memory - Black
product_meta.description: CORSAIR VENGEANCE RGB PRO Series DDR4 memory lights up your PC with mesmerizing dynamic multi zone RGB lighting, while delivering the best in DDR4 performance and stability. Every module boasts ten individually controlled RGB LEDs, while wire free design makes installation simple. Take control with CORSAIR iCUE software and completely customize every module's lighting to match your system, or easily synchronize lighting across all your CORSAIR products with Light LINK. A custom designed PCB provides the highest signal quality for the best level of performance and stability on the latest AMD and Intel DDR4 motherboards, while specially screened ICs unlock superior overclocking.
feature_bullets: Next generation software. Compatibility Intel 100 series, Intel 200 series, Intel 300 series, Intel X299
Custom performance PCB. SPD speed-2133 MHz
Maximum bandwidth and tight response times

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars2,151 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
